action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To provide for the conveyance of seized Russian and Belarusian assets to the people of Ukraine.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Confiscating Corrupt Criminal Proceeds (CCCP) Act of 2022.
Section 981(e) of title 18, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

by adding at the end the following:

in the case of any property owned by a Russian or Belarusian national, to the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development, to be made available to provide humanitarian assistance to the people of Ukraine.
